system.effect: Mechanic – Songs   Musician Songs can be triggered one of four ways. Regardless of the Area of Effect, Songs always affect the user. » When using a Move with the Sonic keyword, Songs may be triggered as a Rapid Action, and the Song’s Area of Effect is the same as the triggering Move’s. » When using a Dance Move, Songs may be triggered as a Shift Action with an Area of Effect of Burst 2. » As a Standard Action, you may trigger one Song, with an Area of Effect of Burst 4. » As a Full Action, you may trigger two Songs, each with an Area of Effect of Burst 4.
